title: Starfield is Getting its Biggest Update Yet - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.01.24
description:
Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $30-off plus free shipping on their best-selling frame.

Greg and Parris talk Starfield and its upcoming May update, the next Batman Arkham game being in VR, and Helldivers 2 becomes the 7th best selling PlayStation published game OF ALL TIME.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:54 - Housekeeping
 - Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
       -  The XCast Goodbye episode of Gamescast
       -  More of Nick’s Pokemon Nuzlocke on the game stream
 - Speaking of: Join Nick and the PokeCrew THIS FRIDAY for another fun-filled Marathon stream as they battle their way to The Elite Four. Will they call Kris Anka so many times he blocks their number? Come find out this Friday at 12pm PT only on twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
 - If that wasn’t enough streaming fun, Tomorrow, the Kinda Funny games afternoon stream kicks off with a sponsored hour of PAC-MAN Mega Tunnel Battle Chomp Champs! It’s a 64-player battle royale to be the last PAC standing. Will it be me, Nick, Mike, or Andy? Find out Thursday at noon on Twitch and YouTube!
                 -   The Roper Report   -
00:09:02 - Starfield's Biggest Update Since Launch Arrives On May 15
00:34:09 - The next Batman: Arkham game is a Meta Quest exclusive
00:47:18 - Helldivers 2 already ranks 7th in lifetime US dollar sales for Sony published games
00:52:01 - Take-Two reportedly closing its Seattle office
00:54:59 - Wee News!
00:56:53 - SuperChats
00:57:36 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Mike
